A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class jgameoflife.CellGrid
This method is called by the Timer object set by startCellularAutomata() above, every STEP milliseconds (optimistically).

C

CellGrid - Class in jgameoflife
This class implements the cells grid of Conway's Game of Life as a subclass of JComponent.
CellGrid(Dimension) - Constructor for class jgameoflife.CellGrid
This constructor initializes the CellGrid object.
clearCellGrid() - Method in class jgameoflife.CellGrid
This method is used to set all cells in the cell grid to 0, wiping out all alife forms and resetting the cellular automata to its starting state.

G

GameOfLife - Class in jgameoflife
This class implements the GUI frontend that provides an interface to this program for the user.
GameOfLife() - Constructor for class jgameoflife.GameOfLife
This method initializes the GameOfLife object that implements the GUI used by this program.

J

jgameoflife - package jgameoflife
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class jgameoflife.GameOfLife
This method is called when the class is run as the frontend to the program.

An implementation of MouseListener.mouseClicked, as part of the MouseListener interface.
mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - Method in class jgameoflife.CellGrid
An implementation of MouseListener.mouseEntered, required because I implement that interface.
mouseExited(MouseEvent) - Method in class jgameoflife.CellGrid
An implementation of MouseListener.mouseExited, required because I implement that interface.

An implementation of MouseListener.mousePressed, required because I implement that interface.
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class jgameoflife.CellGrid
An implementation of MouseListener.mouseReleased, required because I implement that interface.

P

paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class jgameoflife.CellGrid
This method is called when paint() or repaint() is called.

S

seedCellGrid() - Method in class jgameoflife.CellGrid
This method populates the cellGrid by randomly setting 0 cells to 1.
startCellularAutomata() - Method in class jgameoflife.CellGrid
This method is used to begin or resume the cellular automata animation.
stopCellularAutomata() - Method in class jgameoflife.CellGrid
This method is used to suspend the cellular automata animation.
